results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
results.reason: Encourages putting full trust in God.
results.reflection: True trust in God requires surrendering our understanding and submitting to His will.

results.text: When I am afraid, I put my trust in you.
results.reason: Acknowledges turning to God in times of fear.
results.reflection: In moments of doubt or fear, placing our trust in God brings peace and assurance.

results.text: Blessed is the man who trusts in the Lord, whose trust is the Lord.
results.reason: Emphasizes the blessings of trusting in the Lord.
results.reflection: Our ultimate blessing is found in making the Lord our sole source of trust and confidence.

results.text: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.
results.reason: Promises peace through trust in God.
results.reflection: Trusting in God leads to a deep sense of peace that surpasses understanding.

results.text: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in man.
results.reason: Highlights the superiority of trusting in God over human reliance.
results.reflection: Trusting in God as our refuge is always a safer and more secure choice than trusting in human beings.
